page.title: 05A Springfield Child's Day
page.content: {Education}of a{child. I am an 11 year old Springfield child. I get up,have my breakfast and leave for school at 0845. I walk along to school,I have one road to cross.The bell rings at 0900 we go in and have a bible story,then we get our maths out and do them until we do our spelling. Then at 1045 we have playtime we come in and do our English,at 1230 we go for lunch.I have my lunch and then go back. The bell rings at 1315.In the afternoon we paint or do our project. We get out of school at 1500 and I go out to play.I have my tea at 1600. In the evening I watch television.I go to bed at 2100.
